uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper

Class WikiEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper.WikiEdit

  • public abstract class WikiEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a single edit to a Wikipedia article. It is content heavy so costly to build completely.
    Author:
    Stuart

    • Constructor Detail

      • WikiEdit

        public WikiEdit(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String comment,
                java.lang.String wikiTime,
                WikiArticle article)
         throws WikiException
        Constructs all of the edit bar the diff and article as these are the most costly pieces of data
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the edit
        comment - Editors comment
        wikiTime - String from Wikipedia representing time
        article - The associated article
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

    • Method Detail

      • getDiff

        public abstract java.lang.String getDiff()
                                  throws WikiException
        On first call it will retrieve the diff through an external call (costly), afterwards it will just give the cached value. The format of the diff can be discussed - I can remove wiki text and some of the HTML but not quite sure what the final format will be.
        Returns:
        The content of the diff of this edit with the previous one.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

      • getContent

        public abstract java.lang.String getContent()
                                     throws WikiException
        On first call it will retrieve the content through an external call (costly), afterwards it will just give the cached value. Will either be in html format or if you want will have further parsing done to it.
        Returns:
        The content of the article after this edit.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

        public java.lang.String getComment()

        public WikiArticle getArticle()
